structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.text: Unless explicitly stated, exemption of manufactured or mobile homes from the provisions of this chapter is not intended to exempt them from provisions of existing law regulating them for the purposes of health, safety, and welfare.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 340, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 10, effective June 17, 1978.
